welcome_message_body: Welcome to Johannesburg, a city known for its vibrant culture, rich history, and stunning landscapes. Take the time to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Urbanologi
restaurants.description: Urbanologi is a asian restaurant located in EGoli.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Grand Central Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within South Africa.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights to neighboring African countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
